Uses of Package
screens

Packages that use screens
Package
Description
main
 
  • Classes in screens used by main
    Class
    Description
    ClubScreen
    The ClubScreen is where the user can substitute athletes, use items on players, give nicknames to their players and view their players' stats
    Launched from HomeScreen
    Launches HomeScreen, or NicknameScreen
    DraftScreen
    The DraftScreen is where the user drafts their starting team
    Launched from SetupScreen
    Launches HomeScreen upon closing
    EndScreen
    The EndScreen is where the user views a summary of their season, before the program finishes
    Launched from HomeScreen
    Program ends upon closing
    HomeScreen
    The HomeScreen is where the user can choose between visiting the club house, visiting the market, visiting the stadium, moving to the next week, and quitting
    Launched from DraftScreen, or ClubScreen, or MarketScreen, or StadiumScreen, or MatchScreen
    Launches ClubScreen, or MarketScreen, or StadiumScreen, or EndScreen
    MarketScreen
    The MarketScreen is where the user buys and sells athletes and items
    Launched from HomeScreen
    Launches HomeScreen upon closing
    MatchScreen
    The MatchScreen is where the user can view and interact with a volleyball match
    Launched from StadiumScreen
    Launches HomeScreen upon closing
    NicknameScreen
    The NicknameScreen is where the user can nickname their players
    Launched from ClubScreen
    Launches ClubScreen upon closing
    SetUpScreen
    The SetUpScreen is where the user enters their name, team name, preferred game length, and difficulty
    Launched upon execution
    Launches DraftScreen upon closing
    StadiumScreen
    The StadiumScreen is where the user chooses an opposing team to play against
    Launched from HomeScreen
    Launches HomeScreen upon closing
